mapper.select: select a.gid,a.rwly,a.gznr,a.gzbz,a.rwlx,a.czzt,a.cjr, a.shr,c.yhdm,to_char(a.kssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')kssj,to_char(a.jssj,'yyyy-mm-dd')jssj, e.fkgid,e.sfwc,e.wcqksm, (select xsmc from rwdb_xtyhxx x where c.yhdm=x.yhdm)yhmc, (case when a.rwly=0 then '公司工作' when a.rwly=1 then '部门工作' else '个人工作' end)gzlb ,(case when a.rwlx=0 then '重点工作' else '日常工作' end)gzlx ,(case when e.sfwc=0 then '未完成' when e.sfwc=1 then '已完成' else '' end)wcqk from rwdb_rwbxjsh a left join (select b.rwid,b.yhdm from rwdb_taskzrzt b where b.yhdm=#{yhdm})c on c.rwid=a.gid left join (select d.rwid,d.yhdm,d.gid fkgid,d.sfwc,d.WCQKSM,d.sffk from rwdb_rwfk d)e on e.rwid=a.gid and e.yhdm=c.yhdm where a.czzt=2 and nvl(e.sffk,0)=0
mapper.update: update RWDB_RWFK SET SFWC=#{sfwc},WCQKSM=#{wcqksm} where GID=#{fkgid}
update RWDB_RWFK SET SFFK=1 where GID=#{fkgid}
mapper.insert: insert into RWDB_RWFK(gid, rwid, yhdm, sfwc, wcqksm, cjsj) values (#{fkgid}, #{rwid}, #{yhdm}, #{sfwc}, #{wcqksm}, sysdate)
